nodes.text: The University of Alderaan was a renowned university in Aldera, the capital city of the Core World Alderaan. It was one of many medical, academic, and research institutions that attracted experts and students from across the galaxy.

The University of Alderaan was first mentioned in the canon roleplaying sourcebook, Dawn of Rebellion, published by Fantasy Flight Games and released in 2018. The university had previously debuted in Star Wars Legends, specifically in The Illustrated Star Wars Universe, which was released in 1995.
